description.p: Suspended chronomatic energy, captured in pearl-like spheres that offer glimpses of histories past and still to be.

Temporal Retreat. Each pearl can be crushed once, as a bonus action, to instantly jump the local area (1000 ft. sphere) back 5 minutes in time. This undoes all damage, conditions, and death, and resets all interactions. It removes any items gained, and restores any items lost.
The gift itself is comprised of three pearls, which are consumed after use. The recreation of the previous moment is to be done as accurately as can be remembered, with the DM having final judgment.
A long, lightweight spear-like weapon made of a material unknown to this plane. Resonates with the latent energies trapped inside.

Entity Annihilation. As an action, the xyston can be pointed at a target. By unleashing the contained energy, the first being in the path of the weapon is totally annihilated by the beam, eradicating it and any items or gear it was using. This damage is unmitigatable and will never fails to kill the target. In the process, the energy released also results in the destruction of the xyston.
